external_references.description: Koessel, Sean. Adair, Steven. Lancaster, Tom. (2024, November 22). The Nearest Neighbor Attack: How A Russian APT Weaponized Nearby Wi-Fi Networks for Covert Access. Retrieved February 25, 2025.

objects.description: During [APT28 Nearest Neighbor Campaign](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0051), [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) used the native Microsoft utility [cipher.exe](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1205) to securely wipe files and folders – overwriting the deleted data using cmd.exe /c cipher /W:C.(Citation: Nearest Neighbor Volexity)
